name: Bill Adom
description: Am looking for a woman who is not selfish, who is calm and doesn’t like drama. I love traveling but quite nights at home are good too. I prefer a woman of any height. One special woman will find the key which allows entry….. she is beautiful, witty, and intelligent,sense of humor, with smiling eyes that shoot fire when she sees me…. Once inside, there is nothing we cant discuss, watch on tv, unload worries and concerns…make the most perfect, complete, fulfilling, passionate, erotic love…. She is as vital to me as the very air I breathe in….she is the life-sustaining breath of fantasy in my reality. Her touch that leaves me trembling… Lost in a moment of completeness, sharing the same wants, needs and fantasies that wait for us to indulge in all of them and each other and to dream forever no more. This woman is not for fairy tales
